__e: What took you so long to catch on?
Why did you take so long to call me?
Shit, we took so long to get here and he could have a shower.
Why did you take so long to tell me?
You better tell me why it took you so long.
Why didn't you Come home before?
You better tell me why it took you so long.
Hi, I'm so late Took a bit longer than I expected
You know, God only took 6 days to create the world.
It took a little longer than I expected.
We could do worse than go back to the old safe - at least that took him longer!
You know, God only took 6 days to create the world.
And it wasn't more than two shakes of a lamb's tail.
You didn't waste time finding out where I was.
Isn't it a bit late for him to find that out?
It didn't' take her long to get what she wanted
Took you a long time to answer the door.
It certainly took you a long time to say that.
And that didn't take long, did it? Two months after I sailed.
Isn't it a bit late for him to find that out?
I only wanted to see what you were like, and that didn't take very long.
It didn't' take her long to get what she wanted
It took a little doing, Max, but I managed to get these.
Took you a long time to make up your mind, didn't it?
My neighbor had explained how, but it took a while.
NO, WE WERE AT A PARTY, WHICH IS ONLY JUST OVER,
Well actually after 18 days ... it took you a little too long
The factory is late with deliveries.
Well actually after 18 days ... it took you a little too long
The factory is late with deliveries.
It took a policeman to help me, and I'd kind of like to pay him back.
How long was it before we tumbled into your bed?
And how long would you say it took you to get from your home to here?
You keep telling me how hard it was and how long it took to have me.
